channel.title: Need Server help! QUESTIONS THAT MUAST BE ANSWERED PLEASE! delta source
channel.description:
im a new coder of rsps but i played rsps for a year now and now i want to host a server but i want to get the basic codings down. and my source is delta! my questions:
[b]How do I Make a new home place? Starter at the moment is Falador, and I want to make it Varrock Square.[/b]
[b]How can I create commands? example: ::home[/b]
[b]How do I make the teleports (like the ones onmagic tab)(catherby is skiller teleport, make it different to like cities)[/b]
[s][b]How do I make the message when u log in (right now it says Welcome to Deltascape.) how can i change that?[/b][/s]
[b]Real whip animation and 2h stances like runescape[/b]
[b]How do I make an item go in the correct spot? (skill capes, bandos, armadyl go in attack spot)[/b]
[b]How can I create commands (I heard u needed to download something so please post a link for what it is)[/b]
More to come!
PLEASE NOTE THIS IS 317 and DELTA SOURCE

item.title: Need Server help! QUESTIONS THAT MUAST BE ANSWERED PLEASE! delta source
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

ok let me help you here a little

How do I Make a new home place? Starter at the moment is Falador, and I want to make it Varrock Square.
Well first open player.java and search initial x then you should see "initial x and y coordinates of player" or something similar to that Then change th x and y coords to w/e u want
How can I create commands? example: ::home
Well first open client.java and search private void customCommand then add your command. I recommend at the start to download a command generator but you don't have to. A simple ::home command would be [code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home") { triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0); }[/code] In your case you might have to change triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY); to [code]toX = XXXX; toY= YYYY;[/code] since your using delta
How do I make an item go in the correct spot? (skill capes, bandos, armadyl go in attack spot)
open item.java and put the item's ID in the correct spots. EX. Lets say the obby cape (Id is 6568) in item.java search for "cape" and with all the other codes in the your cape int put 6568. you can put it at the end or at the frong it dosent matter just make sure u seperate them correctly with your commas. Then compile and restart your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Server help! QUESTIONS THAT MUAST BE ANSWERED PLEASE! delta source
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

must i explain to everyone… notepad++ is a program like notepad but on steroids. its meant to be used for coders. It makes all the words in pretty colors so you can see it and the one main function that is great is that not only can you use ctrl + f to search a term in a document, but u can use it to search for a term in a whole directory of documents. thats how i track everything down and learn how servers work… it helps alot and im not always bugging the forums with questions now.

Read full topic

item.source: Need Server help! QUESTIONS THAT MUAST BE ANSWERED PLEASE! delta source

item.title: Need Server help! QUESTIONS THAT MUAST BE ANSWERED PLEASE! delta source
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:1, topic:304119”]im a new coder of rsps but i played rsps for a year now and now i want to host a server but i want to get the basic codings down. and my source is delta! my questions:

How do I Make a new home place? Starter at the moment is Falador, and I want to make it Varrock Square.

How can I create commands? example: ::home

How do I make the teleports (like the ones onmagic tab)(catherby is skiller teleport, make it different to like cities)

How do I make the message when u log in (right now it says Welcome to Deltascape.) how can i change that?

More to come![/quote]

Dude i suggest studying java for a little bit and explore the forums .
dont just expect for the community to feed you, or else you wouldnt learn anything, but ill give you some hints on where you can find the information you need.

1.to change starter its in player.java just log ingame, make a new char, and type ::mypos, and search the coords in the player.java, then change it to varrock sqyare

2.commands are simple, look in the downloads section for a command generator they are so efficient , and give you a great idea on how to make commands.

  1. to change teleports open up client.java search for your “catherby” skiller teleport, change the name and the coords.

4.open up client.java and search for “welcome to deltascape” and just change that .

and please remember to compile after every edit you do to the source, so if you have a error you know where u can find it .

Read full topic
